articles.author: Nick Bromberg
articles.title: Report: Indiana QB Kurtis Rourke 'believed' to have played entire 2024 season with re-torn right ACL - Yahoo Sports
articles.description: Rourke first tore his right ACL at the end of the 2022 season while at Ohio and is set for revision surgery next week.
articles.content:
Indiana's Kurtis Rourke finished ninth in the 2024 Heisman voting. (Photo by Steve Limentani/ISI Photos/Getty Images)
Did Kurtis Rourke play the 2024 season with a torn ACL?
